# Visual Studio files
.vs/
.vscode/
*.suo
*.user

*.sln.docstates

# Build output
bin/
obj/
app/
out/

# NuGet Packages
*.nupkg
# NuGet restore
*.nuget.props
*.nuget.targets

# Logs
*.log

# Runtime
*.pdb
*.mdb
*.ilk
*.ipch
*.aps
*.pch

# IIS
_IISExpress/

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp

# Files generated by Visual Studio
TestResults/
*.vspscc
*.vssscc

# Secrets and config
appsettings*.json
app.config
web.config
